mood.description: Combined mood and energy, e.g., 'Happy Energetic', 'Sad Calm'

danceability.description: A score from 0.0 to 1.0 describing how suitable a track is for dancing

energy.description: A measure from 0.0 to 1.0 representing a perceptual measure of intensity and activity

valence.description: A measure from 0.0 to 1.0 describing the musical positiveness conveyed by a track

tempo.description: The overall estimated tempo of a track in beats per minute (BPM)
